com.microsoft.azure.management.website.implementation.api

Class RecommendationRuleInner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.website.implementation.api.RecommendationRuleInner

  • public class RecommendationRuleInner
extends Object
    Represents a recommendation rule that the recommendation engine can perform.
